doc.name: XSLTransformer
doc.description:
This actor reads an XSLT file and apply it to a dom tree. The file or URL is specified using any form acceptable to the FileParameter class.

Currently, this actor requires the Saxon XSLT processor so as to ensure reproducible results. This restriction may be relaxed in later versions of this actor.

FIXME: what should the type of the input/output ports be???.
doc.author: Yang Zhao, Christopher Hylands Brooks
doc.property: The file name or URL from which to read. This is a string with any form accepted by FileParameter.

The parameters to be used in the stylesheet. This is a record that defaults to "emptyRecord()", an expression language command that returns an empty record. For example, if the parameter used in the style sheet is named a with type int, then the styleSheetParameters has type {a = int}. If the style sheet has multiple parameters, then each of them is represented as a field of the record.
